OmniChannelSettings.name: OmniChannelSettings
OmniChannelSettings.label: Omni Channel Settings
OmniChannelSettings.description: Represents OmniChannelSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableOmniAutoLoginPrompt.description: enable Omni Auto Login Prompt field of OmniChannelSettings metadata component.

enableOmniChannel.description: enable Omni Channel field of OmniChannelSettings metadata component.

enableOmniSecondaryRoutingPriority.description: enable Omni Secondary Routing Priority field of OmniChannelSettings metadata component.

enableOmniSkillsRouting.description: enable Omni Skills Routing field of OmniChannelSettings metadata component.
